headline: Caesars Entertainment Debuts IGT’s Kitty Glitter Grand™ Slot Across its Online Casino Platforms and Inside its Atlantic City Resorts
summary: LAS VEGAS, August 04, 2025--Caesars Entertainment, Inc. (NASDAQ: CZR) ("Caesars") today announced it is the first in the industry to launch IGT’s newest installment of its beloved slot title, Kitty Glitter Grand™. The game is now live across Caesars Palace Online Casino, Horseshoe Online Casino, and Caesars Sportsbook & Casino in New Jersey, Pennsylvania, Michigan, West Virginia, and Ontario. It’s also available at Caesars Rewards® destinations in Atlantic City, including Caesars and Harrah’s, w

headline: Dry Creek Rancheria and Caesars Entertainment Break Ground on Caesars Republic Sonoma County
summary: LAS VEGAS, August 04, 2025--On Aug. 2, Dry Creek Rancheria and Caesars Entertainment (NASDAQ: CZR) broke ground on a joint project to turn River Rock Casino into Caesars Republic Sonoma County. The partnership was launched when Dry Creek Rancheria selected Caesars Entertainment as its development and management partner for the new integrated resort. Citizens led the project financing, with Gaming and Leisure Properties, Inc. (NASDAQ: GLPI) ("GLPI") serving as the lead real estate financing partn
